annotation.summary: Armor can be customized by installing upgrades into its available upgrade slots. Each upgrade occupies one slot, and the number of slots depends on the armor. Installing an upgrade takes 10 minutes using the Install Upgrade activity. These upgrades are powered by the wearer’s movement and only function when properly worn.
annotation.prerequisites: Armor with available upgrade slots; must be wearing the armor properly for upgrades to function.

annotation.summary: Armor upgrades with limited-use activations can only be used a set number of times per day, regardless of activation costs. This limit resets during daily preparations and is tied to the upgrade itself, not the armor or user. Removing, reinstalling, or transferring the upgrade does not refresh its uses, and safety systems prevent duplicate installations or repeated activations beyond the limit.
annotation.action_economy: Varies by specific armor upgrade; limited number of activations per day.
annotation.prerequisites: Must have an armor upgrade that specifies a limited-use activation.

annotation.summary: Weapons can be customized by adding upgrades, which occupy specific upgrade slots listed in each weapon’s description. Technological upgrades are called modifications, and hybrid ones are fusions. Installing an upgrade takes 10 minutes using the Install Upgrade activity. These upgrades are powered by the wielder’s motion and only function when installed in a wielded weapon.
annotation.prerequisites: Weapon must have available upgrade slots; access to the Install Upgrade activity
